body_html:
Your approach is the right one. We don't enable alignments history by default because: 1. It requires extra memory 2. It's not always possible, i.e. when using a beam search decoder.
…

body_text:
Your approach is the right one.  We don't enable alignments history by
default because:

1.  It requires extra memory
2.  It's not always possible, i.e. when using a beam search decoder.
…

body:
Your approach is the right one.  We don't enable alignments history by
default because:

1.  It requires extra memory
2.  It's not always possible, i.e. when using a beam search decoder.

On Jun 27, 2017 9:59 AM, "Rylan Schaeffer" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> first question of how to access the attention mechanism's weights?
